testimonials.name: Amina
testimonials.text: SmartSave helped me plan monthly savings and avoid borrowing.

testimonials.name: Peter
testimonials.text: Simple tools, big changes â€” I can see where my money goes.

features.title: Budget Calculator
features.desc: Break down income and fixed/variable expenses to find your net savings.
features.tips: Include all incomes and repeat expenses. Round amounts to simplify planning.

features.title: Savings Goal Tracker
features.desc: Set a target and track monthly progress with projected finish date.
features.tips: Start with a small, consistent monthly amount and increase over time.

features.title: Downloadable Templates
features.desc: Use our starter budget templates to plan offline and teach others.
features.tips: Share templates with household members to align saving goals.

donationOptions.message: Feeds a household for a week
